mapper.select: SELECT o.id AS id, s.student_name AS studentName, t.teacher_name AS teacherName, c.course_name AS courseName, o.course_price AS coursePrice, o.course_buydate AS courseBuyDate FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN student s ON o.student_id = s.student_id LEFT JOIN course c ON o.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.teacher_id WHERE s.student_id = #{studentId}
mapper.update: update `order` set order_status=#{orderStatus} where student_id=#{studentId} and course_id=#{courseId}
mapper.select: select course_price from `order` where student_id=#{studentId} and course_id=#{courseId} limit 1
